title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A responsive personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and contact information with a clean modern UI.

title: Dribbble UI Clone
description: A frontend clone of Dribbble focusing on layout accuracy, modern UI components, and responsive design techniques.

title: Snake Game (JavaScript)
description: A classic snake game implemented using vanilla JavaScript with keyboard controls, score tracking, and collision logic.

title: Kanban Task Board
description: A simple Kanban board application for managing tasks across different stages using an intuitive drag-and-drop interface.

title: Virtual Piano Web App
description: An interactive virtual piano built using JavaScript that allows users to play notes via keyboard and mouse with real-time audio feedback.

title: RAG System for Fitness
description: A Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system focused on the fitness domain, enabling intelligent question answering using document retrieval and language models.
